Title: Halter Evening Dress with Side Slit

Featured-image: 60547-off-white-halter-evening-dress-with-side-slit_p.jpg

----

Description: This form fitting A-line dress is simple yet stylish. It has a halter top bodice with a triangle cut out for just the right hint of flirting. There is a beaded design pattern around the neckline that is mirrored on the bust of the dress. The open back completes this sexy chic look.
